EmailTemplate.name: ScheduleDrugProductDelivery
EmailTemplate.subject: {!$Label.ProductName} - Schedule {!Order__c.PatientID__c} drug product delivery
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Order__c.Coordinator__c},
Quality Assurance Release has been completed for your patient's (Patient ID: {!Order__c.PatientID__c}) drug product. Please login to the portal to schedule their drug product delivery as soon as you can.
If you are facing issues scheduling their delivery, please reach out to us via +1-XXX-XXX-XXXX
Thank You, {!$Label.JanssenBiotechAndLegendBiotech}
